remarks: Move substitution into a class abstraction.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 9-Jul-2011.)  Obsolete as of 19-Aug-2018.  Use ~ csbab instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
csbabgOLD $p |- ( A e. V -> [_ A / x ]_ { y | ph } = { y | [. A / x ]. ph } ) $.
$d A y $.
$d x y $.
